headline.main: Nazis Mass Outside Tunis, Fearing It May Fall Today; NAZIS FEAR TUNIS MAY FALL TODAY

lead_paragraph: AT AN ADVANCED OUTPOST, in Tunisia, Nov. 29 (Delayed) -- I stood atop a hill less than twelve miles from our objective today and saw the suburbs of Tunis. I watched United States medium tanks, supported by a famous British infantry unit, advance into a village [probably Djedeida] east of Tebourba while German shells threw up pillars of dust and smoke around them and enemy planes constantly strafed them and us.
abstract: US tanks supported by Brit infantry advance into Djedeida
